alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Stone; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 06 at 5:22PM CST until March 06 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian, Greene, Stone and Webster. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 522 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Dry Crane Creek at Jasmine Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146, Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road and Parchcorn Creek at Smyrna Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Battlefield, Strafford, Rogersville and Clever. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
